meta.Summary:: MAIB Report on the investigation of the foundering of the fv Purbeck Isle 9 miles south of Portland Bill, England on 17 May 2012 resulting in the loss of her three crew. Report No 7/2013. Published 2 May 2013.

Summary:
MAIB Report on the investigation of the foundering of the fv Purbeck Isle 9 miles south of Portland Bill, England on 17 May 2012 resulting in the loss of her three crew. Report No 7/2013. Published 2 May 2013.

body:
MAIB Report on the investigation of the foundering of the fv Purbeck Isle 9 miles south of Portland Bill, England on 17 May 2012 resulting in the loss of her three crew. Report No 7/2013. Published 2 May 2013.
